text:
Dorothy Malone (January 30, 1924 – January 19, 2018) was an American actress. She won an Academy Award for her role in "Written on the Wind". She also starred in the famous soap opera "Peyton Place" in the 1960s.
Personal life.
Malone died on January 19, 2018 in Dallas, Texas of natural causes at the age of 93.
